attributes.action: Abandon online petitioning as misleading and open to abuse by multiple signing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anyone with several e-mail addresses can sign several times. It is impossible to know when groups are unfairly exploiting the system.
Without negative voting on petitions, any opposition to a petition becomes fragmented by detail and loses its force.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
